inclusion.criterion: Subject is 18 to 70 years of age, inclusive.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has cirrhosis due to chronic HCV infection as documented by:
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has received active interferon therapy within 2 weeks of enrollment.
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis due to chronic HCV infection, but received active interferon therapy within 2 weeks of enrollment.
